name: Null (Calistio)
description:
The robots within the factory go out of control. You're tasked with shutting down the factory and all the robots within. Avoid all robots and hazards inside.

Control

  • Arrow Keys : Move
  • Z : Jump
  • C : Interact

Assets used

  • 0x72 : https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
  • RyanAvx : https://ryanavx.itch.io/breezys-mega-quest
  • Jalastram : https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-jump-1
  • BMacZero : https://opengameart.org/content/mechanical-sounds
